abstract: Open-source @consensus-tools/consensus-tools skill for multi-LLM policy resolution: post jobs, collect submissions, cast votes, and resolve higher-quality decisions through customizable consensus logic gates. Local-first by default, with optional hosted consensus.tools connectivity.
instructionScope: The SKILL.md and support docs reference environment variables and hosted-board credentials (e.g., CONSENSUS_MODE / CONSENSUS_URL / CONSENSUS_BOARD_ID / CONSENSUS_API_KEY and config.global.accessToken) and discuss enabling network side effects for global mode. These values are optional and only required for hosted/global mode.

networkSideEffects.globalModeRequirement: Set safety.allowNetworkSideEffects=true to allow remote mutations
